title: lookingforsomething
author: lookingforsomething
content: Hi, I'm selling a visa virtual card starting 4343 40 of 1000 usd value. Giving it for 850 usd worth of btc, eth or xmr. I can't use it because it is valid only in US.Only via bitcointalk trusted escrow. Thanks.

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: Quote from: lookingforsomething on June 20, 2023, 03:48:55 PMHi, I'm selling a visa virtual card starting 4343 40 of 1000 usd value. Giving it for 850 usd worth of btc, eth or xmr. I can't use it because it is valid only in US.Only via bitcointalk trusted escrow. Thanks.is this legal visa for international? or only usa? can you give information issued??

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 06, 2023, 06:43:17 AMis this legal visa for international? or only usa? can you give information issued??What? Are you blind?OP said that he is selling the card because he can't use it, as it's valid only in the US. Is that so hard to understand?
